page.title: 02A NIGHT AT THE DISCO
page.content: In Strood there is a night club called the Pink Elephant, it is a place where young teenagers can go with their friends. It is open on a Tuesday night and starts at 7 p.m. and ends at 10.30 p.m. After 7.45 they do not let anybody in. The entrance fee is one pound and when everybody leaves pink sheets are given out allowing you to have free food next time you come. The drinks of lemonade and coke are 30p but alcohol is dearer. A DJ plays all the latest records and there is usually a Â£burn' every week when two schools do break dancing and the DJ gives them marks. I enjoy going to this club because it is a chance to get out of the house and also a chance to put on some dressy clothing. By Nicola Melen Chapter School
